title: Monster Hunter: Cross Soul - Novel Updates
tags: Based on a Video Game   Dragons   Fantasy World   Guilds   Monsters   Multiple Protagonists   Sword Wielder   Weak to Strong
author: Seino Gorou
description:
It is an age when giant monsters rule the world of nature, freely roaming the land and soaring through the sky. In order to survive, humanity relies on the hunters, powerful warriors with the strength and intellect to fell such beasts.

Sonia is one such hunter- One that is late for the Wycademy recruitment campaign at Bherna Village, leaving her without a job, a place to stay, and food to eat. Saved by an employee of the Dragon Cat Pavilion Restaurant, she must, for some reason, put her hunting skills to the test in order to pay off her debt!

Based on Monster Hunter Generations, a brand new novelization of the smash hit video game franchise!>
